title: Bug Splat
body:
I get a bug splat error message after champ select when it's trying to bring up the loading screen.

I've tried repairing, completely uninstalling and reinstalling, Started 8/3/16. What else should I try?

replies.body: It sounds like there's an issue with hardware or game files that's failing to render the game and causing you to crash.  I know you've tried some stuff already, but I recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide for details instructions towards getting this fixed up.  Let me know if you still have any issues!

I have the same issue. I guess it has something to do with the Anniversary Win10 update? I send you guys Bugsplat Report last night hope that helps
Right now im uninstalling/ re-installing the game. Nothing else helped for now. I have checked versions, drivers, .net framework 3.5,
Repaired from client. Any other game works perfectly fine. I dont have the Win.old file so I can't go back to prev version to check if it is causing the issue.

This could be happening for other reasons, like outdated drivers or something else.  As a first step, I recommend going through the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide.  If this doesn't resolve your issue, download ou[r hextech repair tool ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)which can help smoothly restore your game files.  Let me know the results!
